programme.title: Mountain Gun Fight Zombies

programme.desc: A father-and-son duo attempt to renovate an old farmhouse but end up angering the spirit of the previous owner.

programme.title: Blok 404

programme.title: Nini Thowok
programme.desc: A film about Nadine and her sister Naya who inherit an inn in Solo, West Java from their later grandmother and are forced to keep it open.

programme.title: Office Uprising
programme.desc: The compound of an arms manufacturer turns into a zombie nightmare when workers are given a drink made using the wrong formula.

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three young men have no choice but to receive their ordination to be monks at an old temple which is said to be cursed by the mythical Pee Nak spirit.

programme.title: Busut Bonang
programme.desc: While investigating the death of Hassan, a local teacher, three people are attacked by an evil spirit called, Penunggu Busut.

programme.title: Rumah Angker Pondok Indah
programme.desc: A family is brutally murdered in their own house. Ever since then, their ghosts linger, terrorising every family that moves into the house. When a new family moves in, history repeats itself.

programme.title: Jailangkung 2
